data.message: Facebook please it would be nice to see my brothers video...I lost my brother 4 months ago and he left behind 3 kids. This would be nice to have of him.

replies.message: Thank you for reaching out about a Look Back video for your loved one, Tony. Unfortunately, we don't currently offer this feature for memorialized accounts. However, requests like yours have reinforced to us that there's more we can do to help people celebrate and commemorate the lives of people they have lost. We are working on that now. -Natalie

Ditto Tony's comment - I lost my son two years ago today and his account was deleted by y'all when we asked you to memoralize it - I would be so appreciative of seeing any pictures he had ...since we cant take anymore :/

I lost my 17 year old son in 2012. It would be nice to see his too. I hope they do not delete his account because it is like my therapy to help deal with it. Sorry to hear that they did that to your son Kelly A. Polley.

they let anyone memorialize an account so if a friend or who ever decided they want it memorialized they just send in a link to the obit and if your not on there friends list it's gone to you that's what happened to me Im not on my kids friends list I was going on his face book to connect in a way hoping people would put pictures of his memorial up, friends who hadn't heard and even hoping someone would tell us who he was down at the water with before he died when I couldn't get on and realized I hadn't copied his pictures I was even more heart broken they won't let us his parents get anything off but let who ever tell them he's deceased and memorialize the account so not cool things like that should be family not just anyone

I wud love to do that as well for my sister. She was killd 2011 due to domestic violence. Her son set up her page originally but cant remember the log in so even if we cud access her acct we cud go fqom there. My parents wud love tgjat. Hjf theres any way we can get in hfp page acct that wud be awesome. Thank u

Hi Facebook :) I am getting tired of seeing the same people on my feed, and I am diligent in unfollowing people I don't want to see, however, I am still only seeing a updates on a small portion of friends - maybe you can put a link that would shuffle the people I see on my feed? That way I can really keep up with all friends on my list? Thanks!

Hey Donna. Did you know you can adjust what you see in your News Feed by sorting which stories you see first, by using friend lists, and by managing which friends, Pages and app stories you want to see? Learn more at: http://on.fb.me/1hGtJXc  -Ryan

Hi Tony, Kelly, Glenda, and Vee.  We're so sorry for your loss and offer our sincere condolences. We appreciate you reaching out to us about a Look Back video for your loved ones.  You can submit a request for your loved one's Look Back video here:https://www.facebook.com/help/contact/1465699090320797. -Jenny
facebook please i to want too see my movie ,please tell me how i can see :)
Facebook please, tell me what i will do to have my own facebook lookback video... I watched my husband own it was very beautiful. Thanks!
#Facebook please, tell me what i will do to have my own facebook lookback video... I watched my husband own it was very beautiful. Thanks!
